channel.title: Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Inside OpenAI’s in-house data agent
item.description: How OpenAI built an in-house AI data agent that uses GPT-5, Codex, and memory to reason over massive datasets and deliver reliable insights in minutes. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/inside-our-in-house-data-agent

item.title: Retiring GPT-4o, GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 mini, and OpenAI o4-mini in ChatGPT
item.description: On February 13, 2026, alongside the previously announced retirement⁠ of GPT‑5 (Instant, Thinking, and Pro), we will retire GPT‑4o, GPT‑4.1, GPT‑4.1 mini, and OpenAI o4-mini from ChatGPT. In the API, there are no changes at this time. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/retiring-gpt-4o-and-older-models

item.title: EMEA Youth & Wellbeing Grant
item.description: Apply for the EMEA Youth & Wellbeing Grant, a €500,000 program funding NGOs and researchers advancing youth safety and wellbeing in the age of AI. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/emea-youth-and-wellbeing-grant

item.title: The next chapter for AI in the EU
item.description: OpenAI launches the EU Economic Blueprint 2.0 with new data, partnerships, and initiatives to accelerate AI adoption, skills, and growth across Europe. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/the-next-chapter-for-ai-in-the-eu

item.title: Keeping your data safe when an AI agent clicks a link
item.description: Learn how OpenAI protects user data when AI agents open links, preventing URL-based data exfiltration and prompt injection with built-in safeguards. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/ai-agent-link-safety

item.title: PVH reimagines the future of fashion with OpenAI
item.description: PVH Corp., parent company of Calvin Klein and Tommy Hilfiger, is adopting ChatGPT Enterprise to bring AI into fashion design, supply chain, and consumer engagement. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/pvh-future-of-fashion

item.title: Introducing Prism
item.description: Prism is a free LaTeX-native workspace with GPT-5.2 built in, helping researchers write, collaborate, and reason in one place. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/introducing-prism
